text: 29|39|karunaiyum, hpir'avnaiyum, hamanaiyum (nam ivvare alittu vittom). Niccayamaka musa ivarkalitam telivana attatcikalaiye kontu vantiruntar. Eninum, ivarkal (avarrai nirakarittu vittup) pumiyil perumai kontu natantatinal (nam vetanaikku ullanarkal. Atil iruntu) avarkal tappittuk kolla mutiyavillai
